Quality Assurance
"Hope-U is professional global sourcing agent in the promotional products, customized gifts market and the supermarket market."
We are a  global sourcing agent who have 12 years experience in the trading business, More than 57 customers from 17 country worldwide are satisfaction hope-u to provided their customers’ favourite gifts and promotional items, Quality and safety have always been, and are very prominent in our organization. We grow up from a small office 80m2 to a global business through hard work because we understand that a little development on our job always could well be a big advance for the services offered. We want to be your favorite source, not only by having the best collection, supported by the best price but also want to be easy and fun to do business with.
We have regional sales in Japan 47%, Spain 23% , France 10%, Germany 10% and USA 10% Through our experience and service, we can ensure maximum your profitable growth supported by great sales team.

Reco
New Journey, New Chapter
Detail
Listen to the voice in your ears this in-ear noise-canceling headset is too comfortable to wear
幸好有款耳机陪着我，让我不用忍受飞机里轰轰的噪音和高铁车厢里喧嚣的嬉闹。就目前来说，这是我用过所有耳机中最舒心的耳机。
Detail
What's the use of the two holes in the earphone after using it for so long?
如果你使用这种耳机，或类似的形状，你会发现几个长开口在耳机底部。那么他们有什么作用呢?因为它更美观还是更节省材料和减轻重量？事实上，耳机本身的重量不是很大，而且这些开口很小，不会减轻重量。
Detail
High appearance level, good sound quality true wireless bluetooth headset experience
我开始用真无线蓝牙耳机算是比较早的，所以我身边的人也都比较早就知道有这种产品，但是当时大家对于这类耳机的音质和稳定性都有疑虑，不过随着各种品牌都在推出自己的真无线蓝牙耳机产品，大家对于真无线蓝牙耳机的接受度也是越来越高了。近来就有不少朋友让我推荐。
Detail
Only a hundred yuan price, shell prince can enjoy a thousand yuan level sound, worth it
Think about how important music is to you, what you use most often, what you care about most, and you'll know which one to choose. Of course, the premise of all this, is to go to the store after the a
Detail
Bose 700 Everything you need to know about the noise-cancelling headphone experience is here
对于Bose的全新一代头戴式降噪耳机，或许大家已经都期盼了很久，毕竟距离上一代产品QC35 II的发布已经过去了2年时间，新一代产品理应与大家见面了。今年7月，新品如期而至，不过这一次Bose却并没有按照套路出牌。全新的外观设计，全新的型号命名以及全新的使用体验，

Company Profile
We are Hope-U from Ningbo China, a global sourcing agent who have 15For the last couple of years we focus only on one thing: How to make your work better. We think, we design, we apply different kind of accessories to your company. Being a design house jointly invested by 20 manufacturers with very different competent and manufacturing process, we have come up with more than 69 designs covering most of the mainstream. We offer our design with competitive manufacturing process cost to support brands with attitudes and styles. Come talk to us. Years` experience in the trading business. Hope-U SWOT in 2021STRENGTHS- Strong & Diversified purchasing ability: 134 new items developed. - Excellent Quality Control ( 0% claim)- Samples & Order Delivery on time date: 96.5%- Professional service- Quick response- Able to handle urgent orders- Honest, Reliable, Hardworking, ProactiveOPPORTUNITIES- New products development- Closed relationship with customerWhy customer choose us: We have strong ability to purchase a wide range of products and provide the product solutions for customers. More styles in small quantity are welcome too. Our core competitive is new product development, we developed the tools 182 sets and clip IC 1 within 3 yearsWe are easy and flexible communication and help customers save a lot of time, and give all-wave consideration to our customers with strong service awareness. We understand what customer need and once connected, we will build long-term cooperation with trust. Never Stop Improving.
